xml.data:
Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 3 Āsavagocchaka » 3.3 Āsavasampayuttaduka » 3.3.5 Saṃsaṭṭhavāra
3.3.5.1--4 Paccayānulomādi
Āsavagocchaka
Āsavasampayuttaduka
Saṃsaṭṭhavāra
Paccayānulomādi
73.
1165Āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho āsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1166Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā cha (sabbattha cha), vipāke ekaṃ…pe…  avigate cha.
1167Āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—  vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe saṃsaṭṭho vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)
1168Āsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā…pe… .
1169Nahetuyā dve, naadhipatiyā cha, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte cha, naāsevane cha, nakamme cattāri, navipāke cha, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, navippayutte cha. (Evaṃ itarepi dve gaṇanā kātabbā.)
